summary: Who is Poon? - In a world where digital assets reign supreme, Poon has always dreamed of amassing crypto wealth beyond his wildest dreams. Inspired by his friends who have gone to the moon, Poon spent countless nights charting and analyzing trends in the market to find the next big opportunity. With unwavering determination, Poon decided to take things into his own hands and is now building his team to go to the moon together.
